summary: The refactor partially implements the requested pages/components/sections structure (new `pages/HomePage.tsx`, `components/Navbar.tsx`, `components/Footer.tsx`, and several `sections/*` files). However, it appears to duplicate and keep the old `components/marketing/*` and `components/marketing/sections/*` files (none removed), which does not clearly satisfy the “move existing components” requirement. The diff summary also indicates additional unrequested features/files (e.g., source bundle download support, new hooks, Tailwind/theme changes) that violate the “no UI/content changes” and “no new features” constraints.

missing_requirements.requirement: Move (relocate) the existing marketing components and sections into `frontend/src/components/` and `frontend/src/sections/` (not duplicate), and update imports so the build passes.
missing_requirements.reason: No files were removed, and the old paths under `frontend/src/components/marketing/*` and `frontend/src/components/marketing/sections/*` are still present (and listed as modified). This suggests the components/sections were not actually moved/relocated cleanly; instead, new copies may have been added under the new folders.

missing_requirements.requirement: Update `frontend/src/App.tsx` to import `Navbar` from `src/components`, `HomePage` from `src/pages`, and `Footer` from `src/components` (per AC), and render them in order while preserving wrapper structure/classes.
missing_requirements.reason: `App.tsx` imports use relative paths (`./components/...`, `./pages/...`) rather than `src/components` and `src/pages` as explicitly stated in the acceptance criteria. Wrapper preservation cannot be verified beyond what is shown.

missing_requirements.requirement: Provide full updated file contents for every file that changes path or content as part of the refactor (not just summaries).
missing_requirements.reason: The diff summary shows many modified files (especially under `frontend/src/components/marketing/*` and `frontend/src/components/marketing/sections/*`) but does not include their updated contents—only file names and a separate `frontend-file-summaries.txt` summary.
evidence: MODIFIED FILES list includes multiple `frontend/src/components/marketing/*` and `frontend/src/components/marketing/sections/*` entries without contents
frontend-file-summaries.txt (modified) is a summary, not full file contents

hallucinated_features.description: “Download Source Bundle” feature (footer download button, new GetCode content around downloading `/source-bundle.txt`, and the source bundle file itself).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly disallows adding new features/content; the request was only to move files and update imports/composition without UI/content changes.
evidence: frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx (added): contains "Download Source Bundle" button and link to `/source-bundle.txt`

hallucinated_features.description: Added/changed hooks and motion/scroll behavior infrastructure beyond file moves (e.g., `usePrefersReducedMotion`, `useScrollProgress`, `useQueries` placeholder).
hallucinated_features.reason: Non-goals forbid refactoring component logic beyond import/path updates and adding new features; these new hooks are not part of the requested folder restructure requirements.

hallucinated_features.description: Tailwind/theme/CSS changes for a “high-contrast neon dark theme” (tokens, utilities, animations).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest forbids changing Tailwind theme tokens, CSS variables, or animation timings; these changes are not requested as part of a pure restructure.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (modified): mentions `frontend/src/index.css` changes and `frontend/tailwind.config.js` extended with neon tokens/animations

hallucinated_features.description: Added tracking/attribution behavior (caffeine.ai UTM link built from `window.location.hostname`).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; constitutes new content/behavior in the UI rather than a pure file move.
evidence: frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx (added): builds `appIdentifier` from hostname and includes caffeine.ai link with UTM parameters
